title-group.article-title: SHARP ANISOTROPIC INTERPOLATION ERROR ESTIMATES FOR RECTANGULAR RAVIART-THOMAS ELEMENTS

abstract.p: Anisotropic Lp-norm error estimates are derived for the standard rectangular Raviart-Thomas elements RT[k](K̃) in ℝd for p ∈ [1,∞], k ≥ 0 and d ≥ 2. Here K̃ is an affine image of an axi-parallel parallelotope K. The proofs are based on a variant of the classical Poincaré inequality. The estimates derived make full use of the asymmetric nature of the vector space components of RT[k](K̃); a Shishkin mesh example demonstrates their superiority over previous estimates.
